$metadata.name: Inference Labs Design Tokens
$metadata.description: Machine-readable design tokens for Inference Labs / Inference Network. Import into Tailwind, CSS-in-JS, Figma Tokens, or Style Dictionary.

dark.description: Primary dark background. Near-black with a slight green tint. Use for page backgrounds in dark mode, headings on light surfaces.

light.description: Primary light background. Off-white/cream. Use for page backgrounds in light mode, light-mode surfaces.

accent.description: Brand accent. Neon cyan-green. Use sparingly: CTAs, highlights, active states, data emphasis. NEVER as a large-area background.

black.description: Pure black. Use for borders, dividers, high-contrast UI elements.

white.description: Pure white. Use for text on dark surfaces, container backgrounds, inverse surfaces.

gray-mid.description: Medium gray. Use for secondary text, disabled states.

gray-light.description: Light gray. Use for subtle borders, placeholder text.

dark-light.description: Subtle hover tints. Brand dark at 40%.

white-mid.description: Text on dark images. White at 50%.

white-subtle.description: Ghost buttons, borders on dark. White at ~10%.

display.description: Display and heading typeface. Use for hero copy, feature names, H1, H2, pull quotes — anything that needs to feel like a brand moment.

body.description: Body and UI typeface. Use for all functional copy: body text, navigation, forms, labels, tables, H3 and below.

mono.description: Monospace typeface. Use EXCLUSIVELY for: code, cryptographic hashes, proof strings, wallet addresses, CLI output, numerical data requiring precision.

hero.description: Hero / display copy. Large-format marketing headlines.

label.description: UI labels, navigation items, small text. Uppercase optional.

code.description: Code, hashes, addresses, proof strings, CLI output.

rules: Letter spacing must always be tight (-0.02em) to neutral (0em). Never use loose/expanded tracking.
Do not use Host Grotesk for body copy — it is display-only.
Do not use Inter for hero headlines — Host Grotesk carries brand authority.
Fragment Mono is mandatory for cryptographic strings, never use a proportional font for these.

spacing.description: Use only these values for padding, margin, and gap. Do not use arbitrary spacing values.

default.description: Default card and container border in light mode.
